content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.DATABASES WHERE [name] = 'TPCDSDBDemo') 
CREATE DATABASE TPCDSDBDemo
GO

ALTER DATABASE TPCDSDBDemo COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
GO


USE [master]
CREATE LOGIN LoadingUserDemo WITH PASSWORD = 'Msftdemo2022!'
GO

USE [TPCDSDBDemo]
CREATE USER LoadingUserDemo FOR LOGIN LoadingUserDemo; 
GO 

ALTER ROLE db_owner ADD MEMBER LoadingUserDemo;
GO

USE [TPCDSDBDemo]
CREATE SCHEMA staging_tpcds001gb 
GO
CREATE SCHEMA staging_tpcds005gb 
GO
CREATE SCHEMA staging_tpcds010gb 
GO
CREATE SCHEMA staging_tpcds050gb 
GO
CREATE SCHEMA staging_tpcds100gb
GO
CREATE SCHEMA staging_tpcds250gb
GO

CREATE SCHEMA tpcds001gb 
GO
CREATE SCHEMA tpcds005gb 
GO
CREATE SCHEMA tpcds010gb 
GO
CREATE SCHEMA tpcds050gb 
GO
CREATE SCHEMA tpcds100gb 
GO
CREATE SCHEMA tpcds250gb 
GO

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Msftdemo2022!';

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys.database_scoped_credentials WHERE [name] = 'AzureStorageCredential_MSI')
    CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL AzureStorageCredential_MSI WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'
;


CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [SasADLSDemoDatabaseScoped]
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
     SECRET = '?sv=2020-08-04&ss=bfqt&srt=sc&sp=rwdlacupx&se=2023-03-23T02:46:21Z&st=2022-03-22T18:46:21Z&spr=https&sig=m%2FhZa4SFboQpwUxMcCpXEhCMvdN%2B2GmZf%2FXP0byY5yU%3D';
GO


IF NOT EXISTS (
		SELECT *
		FROM sys.external_file_formats
		WHERE [name] = 'SynapseParquetFormat'
		)
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat]
		WITH (FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET);

DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [ds_tpcdsacct_rawdata]
IF NOT EXISTS (
		SELECT *
		FROM sys.external_data_sources
		WHERE [name] = 'ds_tpcdsacct_rawdata'
		)
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [ds_tpcdsacct_rawdata]
		WITH (LOCATION = 'abfss://rawdata@tpcdsacct.dfs.core.windows.net',
        CREDENTIAL = [SasADLSDemoDatabaseScoped]);
